text: My very first dental visit and I'm very satisfied. Dr Felicia and her team were very warm and approachable. Dr Felicia was indeed exceptional with her knowledge. Overall I'm quite impressed and definitely will come to visit again.

I had an excellent experience at this dental clinic. The doctor was incredibly patient and professional, informing of every step and making me feel at ease. The staff were equally impressive‚Äîcourteous, friendly, and attentive throughout my visit. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for top-notch dental care. A truly pleasant experience!"

Doctor Benjamin is very skilled. This is the second time I did implant crown at this clinic. Both times done by Dr Benjamin. He explained the procedure and ensured that I was okay throughout the procedure. I felt reassured that I was in good hands. Thank you to Dr Benjamin and his team!

Dr. Chelsea Yang is a gentle yet thorough in her work. She takes the time to explain procedures clearly, ensuring a comfortable and reassuring experience. Highly recommend! And thumbs up to the reception who did the registrationüëçüèª

I had a very disappointing experience at this clinic with Dr. Chelsea. I went in with severe mouth pain and bleeding gums. Dr. Chelsea dismissed it as just ‚Äúsmall ulcers‚Äù and didn‚Äôt provide any medication or proper advice. A week later, the pain got worse, so I went to another clinic turns out it was actually a cold sore, and they immediately prescribed the correct treatment. Because of the delay in diagnosis, I had to suffer through an extra week of unnecessary pain and my healing took much longer. I really expected more professionalism and proper care. Would not recommend based on my experience.
